name: Commissioner's authority to grant waiver ARTICLE 9. LICENSING OF ADJUSTERS AND BILL REVIEWERS
text: [§431:8-329]  Commissioner's authority to grant waiver.  Upon receiving a written request and a showing of good cause, the commissioner may grant a waiver of any requirement of an insurance law or rule as applied to an applicant or a producer. [L 2012, c 66, pt of §1]
